text: Ara yakhana tadera bala haya -- “imana ano allah ya nayila karechena tate,” tara bale -- “amara bisbasa kari ya amadera kache nayila hayechila.” Athaca tara abisbasa kare ya tara pare eseche, yadi'o uha halo dhruba satya, samarthana karache ya tadera kache rayeche tara. Balo -- “tahale tomara kena allah‌ra nabidera era age hatya karate yacchile? Yadi tomara bisbasi haye thako.”
